content.label:
There are FOUR RACING games i want for iPad Pro 12.9:

1.  HYDRO THUNDER
2.  HYDRO THUNDER HURRICANE
3.  VIRTUA RACING
4.  DAYTONA USA
I play this with a gamevice and although sometimes the steering is frustrating I enjoy and recommend playing this games if you like racing games and good storylines.

Great game! Fantastic graphics. However, there are two things I wish this game had. These are very minor because it is already a perfect game. A free roam option so you can spend time exploring the highly detailed courses. The developers spent a lot of time creating this world, it would be nice to see it without the pressure of racing. The second thing is a simple stunt practice course with no time limit or other riders so you could perfect jumps and tricks. 
  I also enjoy playing the game without having to spend a lot more money on power ups like so many other games require you to do now.
Awesome game lots of fun

title.label: What racing games should look up to

content.label: Just 100% this game today and played for about 7:30 hours in total, this game is absolutely amazing, and the mechanics are smooth, tricks are easy to execute without issue, water physics are fair, and the difficulty is right where it should be.
Awesome game but needs more rides
Amazingly fun
Fun game! The only thing that would make it better is if the tilt controls also had an accelerator on the right side where the second brake is.

Great game there are so many career races but when I got to one of the career where you have to stunt to win it won't let me do certain stunts that I have. And I don't repeat the same stunts over. For the people who don't like the controls you can change them in the settings.
Awesome game my son loves it so much
I'd rate it 5 if it didn't take down the battery SO fast.
Really fun and vool
Don't play many games but this one is truly addicting. Also if you play enough you really don't need to spend too much extra real money.

These devs are really being generous making this game only $3. The game is extremely fun and has a profound amount of content that is earned at good steady rate which alleviates the boredom factor that a lot of devs don't take into account. Would recommend to everyone, especially if you miss the old arcade classics, but with a twist
Definitely worth the money. It's fast and addictive.   Difficult at times too.  I'd recommend it to people who like racing games

Great addition to the series. Graphics are fantastic and the music too.

[Oct 20 2016]

The game is fun but the difficulty needs to be tweaked. It's nearly impossible, even at the easiest level, to complete the career mode. C'mon, give the casual gamers a break and make the easy level truly easy. Hopefully the developer will adjust it.

[Jan 10 2017]

Developer still has not adjusted the difficulty at the end of the career mode. Scoring a perfect three is impossible, even on the latest iPhone, which you must do to complete the game. Please adjust easy level.
Hi guys this rocks and it's  the of series riptide very impressed with game. A very special GEM of a game great job guys.
Reminds me a little of the old Jet Moto game so far, nice graphics smooth controls.
Ok

I really like this game but when I want to a certain stunt it doesn't want to do it. I assure you I'm doing them at the right time and moving my fingers. The sensitivity for controls need to be higher for stunt related actions. Overall good game though. Definitely worth buying!
Absolutely love this game
Yeah, what Mouse said.
I like it.

name.label: A n y M o u s e

title.label: Excellent water physics and great online racing

content.label:
This is one of the best racing games I've played. My first racing game was Pole Position (guess that gives away my age) but I've enjoyed numerous racing games including Gran Turismo and many F1 games over the years.

This game has excellent water physics, which means you get bumped around a lot by waves, just like you do on a jet ski in real life. You really have to think quick and make constant micro-adjustments to 'land' on the water correctly, on both the big jumps and also on the small micro-jumps in choppy water--to get the best times.

Online play is fantastic! Some keys to success include:
 - on jumps, always get your jet pointed in the right direction before landing,
 - use most, but not all, shortcuts (some are actually slower),
 - know when to use tricks (and when not!)
 - know the best trick for each jump (tip: don't do a big trick that'll give you more boost than your boost meter can hold; that just wastes time),
 - save your boost to use at the optimal time (many folks use it right away, which isn't always the best way to use it)
 - when behind, draft others for extra speed,
 - play online, watch the fastest drivers, then do what they do!
I love playing this game. Sort of reminds me of the old JetMoto games from PlayStation. Syncs up with my AppleTV so I can slo play on the big screens.

title.label: Fresh idea for a racing game.

content.label: I have enjoyed this water racing app and is easy to learn and advance.
Don't pay to play this cheesy game
Awesome graphics!
At the krez race. Very frustrating.
This is how the settings really are, Easy=Normal Normal=Hard and Hard=You Must Not Have A Life. I have GP2 also. While that one had a less developed feel and was too easy, I enjoy it much more.

Super-fun game idea. Question: Why does every racing game need to have the floppy-fish steering? They can't make a challenging race game without giving you terrible equipment? Come onnnnnnnnnn
I recommend that you buy this game, totally worth your money time
This game is so cool best race game to date
When I first got the game I didn't like it that much. But the more I play it the more I like it!

title.label: Splendid game, and not easy AT ALL

content.label:
I freaking love this game. Better graphics, super strong AI... it's a good challenge even if you set the game difficulty at Easy.

To beat the AI later in game, you really need to remember all the lanes, all the shortcuts and improve your riding skills multiple times. 

And surprisingly you need to statically hit the break from time to time. I think it's the only racing game where  break actually matters. Nice design!!!

I love this game and I can never put it down. The only thing is I wish there where more opportunities to upgrade my characters vehicle. You end up earning "money" competing but there a is limited amount of upgrades you can "buy"

title.label: Still waiting for developers to address AI issues.

content.label:
Simple game to learn with some annoying quirks (a tie, which has happened three times due to computer AI magically speeding up at the finish line, automatically places you as runner up). The game absolutely chews through the battery on an iPhone 6 though.

Edit: As others have commented, after advancing in the game, it suddenly becomes insanely hard and basically unbeatable. Bad game design imo. Not worth playing until they fix the difficulty settings. 

Would love to see one of the developers actually beat the Grand Prix courses with maxed out skis at level 25.

This game is way more addictive for me than I care to admit... Super fun and challenging at the same time! It takes a little bit to get the steering sensitivity set to preference and a little while to figure things out in the game, but gameplay is fantastic!

I played the game much and i set difficulty on easy. But when i reach th kres boss battle it is very difficult with my best full maxed out vehicle and i lose every time. I think needs an update for having ultra easy difficulty
------
Finally finished 
It was very hard to finish all the races in career mode. But with help of Apple tv i could it eventually.
Now what i'm expecting is the next riptide title.
There was one thing annoyed me and was the online mode.
Every time i attempted to play an online match there was no opponents  and i.could never play online mode.

title.label: Best jet ski racing game I've found

content.label: Love version 2

I'd say it's still the best game series in the store and in its kind, but the design of game course and tracks weren't as exciting as it was in GP2. The difficulty went up; choice of jet soooo restricted that makes feel frustrated. However, love to see those old tracks in GP being renovated.
Excellent gameplay

I have both of the other Riptide games and this compares favorably. Fantastic graphics and great sound and music create a compelling racing game. Yes it can be challenging, but any game where you race on moving water can be tough. Will you need to restart races? Sure because like I said racing on moving water is a challenge, but I don't think it's totally unfair. Upgrade your machine and keep at it, and eventually the wins will come.
Just what I have been looking for in a hydro racing game!!!

Love the game but the latest update has given it (or at least me) troubles. Mainly, the touch screen isn't responsive in certain sections of the screen like the pause or left side. Sure an update will fix, but until then I'm shelving it.
Great graphics! Smooth playing, super fun! One of the best games ive gotten on iphone!

Personally I thought the pictures and reviews made the game sound better than it really was. I give one star for the false advertising of this app... If the consumer doesn't believe me, simply buy and play it yourself, then rate it when you realize.

The game is the best of the series so far. Story mode is pointless but some people like a scripted story. The HUGE problem is the boss levels. If you have your best jetski maxxed out the game still cheats on boss levels. They get boosts you can't get, they recover faster then any racer in the game. This is kind of expected HOWEVER when you get to Krex, there are BOMBS that keep you from winning. Seriously, all through the game it is playable and winnable with retries depending on your skill. But the final boss is NOT a race, it's a pointless exercise is cheating. This is a race game. Last boss it stops being a race game and it becomes something STUPID.
